price: Bila ya shaka tungeli mshika kwa mkono wa kulia,
footnotes: Basi bila ya shaka tungeli mshika akitoe kama mtu anavyo mkamata mtu kwa mkono wa kulia akammaliza hapo hapo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
